p:
AUC values of sub-models from the ensemble ENM indicated that Maxent had the highest performance among all the sub-models. Thus, we used Maxent to predict range shifts for Rhodiola species and species groups. We randomly selected 25% of the locations as test data and used the remaining 75% as the training dataset. This was the same approach used for ensemble modelling; we used default values for other parameters
30 .
